<title level="1" pfs="Standard">[Osyluth (Bone Devil)](/Monsters.aspx?ID=608)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

An osyluth is an unparalleled inquisitor that revels in the sadism and torture for which [Hell](/Planes.aspx?ID=18) is so well known. These devils' charge is to seek out heresies, both among mortals and among other fiends—a commandment they uphold with unwavering fervor. They spawn within the Styx-fed swamps of Hell's fifth layer, Stygia; where heresies and the souls of heretics stagnate, osyluths eventually rise. In the remote corners of that same layer of Hell, they build massive, calcified hives where they perform their vile interrogations and perfect their torturous arts upon lesser devils and petitioners alike.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Fiend](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13)): DC 26

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 24

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 21
</column>

</column>

<image src="/images/Monsters/Devil_Osyluth.png" />
</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 9">[Osyluth](/Monsters.aspx?ID=608)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="LE" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Large" />
<trait label="Devil" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=44" />
<trait label="Fiend" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=70" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Bestiary 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=32) pg. 73 <sup>2.0</sup>, [Pathfinder #147: Tomorrow Must Burn](/Sources.aspx?ID=8) pg. 78</row>

**Perception** +21; [greater darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12)

**Languages**
[Celestial](/Languages.aspx?ID=16), [Draconic](/Languages.aspx?ID=2), [Infernal](/Languages.aspx?ID=19); [telepathy 100 feet](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=37)

**Skills**
[Arcana](/Skills.aspx?ID=2) +18, [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5) +19, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +21, [Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13) +17, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +20

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +5

**Dex** +5

**Con** +4

**Int** +3

**Wis** +4

**Cha** +4
</row>

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 28 

**Fort** +17 

**Ref** +18 

**Will** +17 

+1 status to all saves vs. magic
</row>

**HP** 135

**Immunities**
fire

**Resistances**
physical 10 (except [silver](/Equipment.aspx?ID=277)), poison 10

**Weaknesses**
good 10

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 35 feet, fly 30 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
jaws +21 ([Evil](/Traits.aspx?ID=64), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103)),
**Damage** 2d10+11 piercing plus 1d6 evil

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
claw +21 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Evil](/Traits.aspx?ID=64), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [reach 10 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)),
**Damage** 2d6+11 slashing plus 1d6 evil

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
stinger +21 ([Evil](/Traits.aspx?ID=64), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [reach 15 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)),
**Damage** 1d10+11 piercing plus 1d6 evil and osyluth venom

**Ranged**
<actions string="Single Action" />
bone shard +21 ([Evil](/Traits.aspx?ID=64), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [range increment 30 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=248)),
**Damage** 2d6+8 piercing

**Divine Innate Spells** DC 25
- **2nd**
[Invisibility](/Spells.aspx?ID=164) (at will; self only)
- **4th**
[Dimension Door](/Spells.aspx?ID=69) (at will), [Dimensional Anchor](/Spells.aspx?ID=70) (×2), [Discern Lies](/Spells.aspx?ID=74), [Zone of Truth](/Spells.aspx?ID=379)
- **5th**
[Dimension Door](/Spells.aspx?ID=69), [Phantom Pain](/Spells.aspx?ID=220)

**Rituals** DC 25

- **1st**
[Infernal Pact](/Rituals.aspx?ID=23)

**Osyluth Venom**  ([Poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=126)) **Saving Throw** DC 25 Fortitude; **Maximum Duration** 6 rounds; **Stage 1** 2d6 poison damage, [enfeebled 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=13) (1 round); **Stage 2** 3d6 poison damage and enfeebled 1 (1 round); **Stage 3** 3d6 poison damage and enfeebled 2 (1 round). Once a creature reaches stage 3, it takes a –4 status penalty to Will saves against attempts to [Coerce](/Actions.aspx?ID=52) it for 1 hour (this is a mental effect).

**Quick Invisibility**   The osyluth can cast innate [_invisibility_](/Spells.aspx?ID=164) using only 1 action.

**Sadistic Strike**   An osyluth deals an extra 2d6 damage whenever they Strike an [enfeebled](/Conditions.aspx?ID=13), [frightened](/Conditions.aspx?ID=19), or [prone](/Conditions.aspx?ID=31) creature.

**Stygian Inquisitor** <actions string="Single Action" /> ([Linguistic](/Traits.aspx?ID=101), [Mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=106)) The osyluth telepathically questions a creature affected by zone of truth. After 1 round, if the creature intentionally refuses to answer the question, it takes 2d6 [mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=106) damage.

**Tail Sweep** <actions string="Single Action" />  The osyluth sweeps their tail in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in the cone must succeed at a DC 26 Reflex save or be knocked [prone](/Conditions.aspx?ID=31).

</column>

<aside>
<title level="2" noclass="true" icon="/images/Icons/Sidebar_2_AdditionalLore.png">Artists of Agony</title>

An osyluth practices the craft of torture with the passion of an artist. Their skill draws forth all manner of truths and secrets from their victims, which an osyluth can recall with immaculate precision even centuries later. Over time, osyluths amass sizable collections of information, making them particularly valuable resources to diabolists and other evil spellcasters who crave infernal knowledge. Of course, such conjurers also often employ osyluths for the devils’ cruel talents of interrogation, perpetuating the cycle of spilled blood and stolen secrets.
</aside>

<document level="2" id="creature-family-30" />
